text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @Facebook Unconstitutional executive order that will be immediately challenged and tossed. It’s not legal, Trump does not have authority, BECAUSE HE’S NOT A DICTATOR! Trump needed to distract the news media from the coronavirus death toll, and that’s why he’s doing this ridiculousness.
